reviews.review_msg: Fairly easy course, game theory is by definition mathematically intense and Shih En did a good job of teaching it. The course runs biannually and he makes previous exams w/ solutions available. Averages on exams were low (midterm: 30.5%, final: 36.5%), exams were fair. Course was taught like a standard MATH course, comparable to MATH 240/MACM 101.
